pages.text: "Beam me up, Scotty."$(p)The Teleporter is a multiblock that allows players to go from Point A to Point B via teleportation. The size of a teleporter is 3x4, consiting of Teleporter Frames and a Teleporter. $(p)The Teleporter must be powered and set to a frequency in order to be functional. Two Teleporters

must be set to the same frequency in order for them to connect. $(p)Teleporters also double as teleportation points for your Portable Teleporter.$(p)$(bold)Blocks required:$()$(li)Teleporter (only one per Teleporter) $(li)Teleporter Frame
